(quote of the day)

if you’re looking for unblocked games, you’ve stumbled into the right place! we have an active dev team adding games at least every week.

want to suggest a game? do so on our forums. want to know about the very handsome and muscular devs? check the Meet the Team page. want to talk to the devs slightly more in depth or possibly join the team? join the discord server.
